Message:
’Tis unknown to me how many
years have passed since then,
but I was suddenly set free.

By the hands a human who
wields a mysterious staff,
claiming to have come
from another world.

To think this was
the one who freed me.
I expected this human
to be extraordinary,

but all he prattles on about
is carefree nonsense...
saving the world and what not.

Hmph, feigning
the virtuous hero, I see...
Scoundrels like this are
the most malicious.

’Tis certain he aims to attain
the power of Tama the Glorious,
but I shall not let that be.

That mysterious staff
grants power to witches.
Oh, how much more powerful
I could be if I could
have it all to myself.

But, it appears that this human is
the only one able to use that staff.

I suppose I will just have to
take advantage of this situation.
Heeeh-heh-heh~♪
